channel.title: InrestructX | 718/742 - All Skills Working - Construction - VPS Hosted 24/7
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://s23.postimg.org/jtu2rwqsr/Inrestruct_X.gif[/img][/CENTER]
[center][IMG]http://eternalpvm.netii.net/forums/images/portal.png[/img][URL=http://"http://inrestructx.com/"]Home[/URL] [IMG]http://eternalpvm.netii.net/forums/images/forumicon.png[/img][URL=http://"http://inrestructx.com/index.php?/index"]Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://eternalpvm.netii.net/forums/images/attack.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://inrestructx.com/webclient.html"]Play Now[/URL] [IMG]https://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/nuvola2/16x16/apps/download_manager.png[/img][URL=http://"http://inrestructx.com/client.jar"]Download now[/URL][/center]
[SIZE=6]Why us?[/SIZE]
InrestructX is a server with a vast variety of different activities. Every now and then new activities are added to keep the players happy and satisfied. Even though our development team basically only consists of one person (Two side-persons), updates are being made [U]every single day[/U]. InrestructX has now been up for a month without any problems whatsoever. The player count is increasing every day - We do our best to keep this up. The server has never had any issues with the stability, our powerful 8GB Dedicated Server VPS makes sure that never in under any circumstances happens!
[SIZE=6]Features[/SIZE]
[ul][*]Fully working construction skill, almost 100% perfected to be as Rune-scape like as possible! [*]Master capes with perfect particles [*]Every single skill working. [*]Vast variety of items, including items such as Virtus wand, book, Drygores & Ascension crossbow! [*]Constant updates on our server & website. [*]Perfected drops - No more issues with our well-known Matrix 'Bone beads' and other items, everything has been rewritten! [*]A variety of bosses, such as Nex, Nomad, Bork, Queen Black Dragon, Corporeal beast and many more! [*]Fully working highscores. [*]Fully working voting system. [*]Many minigames - Dominion tower, Castle-wars, Duel arena, Clan wars. [*]Several open staff spots - You think you've got what it takes? Come prove yourself to us! [*]Perfect skilling XP rates. You never have to worry about one skill being too difficult or another too easy, they're all perfected.[/ul]
[SIZE=6]Screenshots[/SIZE]
[img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-Y4avjqdIwrI/VNkD6CBW2kI/AAAAAAAAABI/BNJUjnWfX3U/w1044-h538-no/Construction.png[/img] [img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-7TvWesfnzWg/VNkEFdYlSoI/AAAAAAAAABQ/3KRwTLDIFQg/w1044-h538-no/Agility.png[/img] [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-66RDdOoboxI/VNkD5yQY-xI/AAAAAAAAABE/T5QmAoBdbkU/w1044-h538-no/Corporeal%2Bbeast.png[/img] [img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-_mzYSsJmzsc/VNkEnpo748I/AAAAAAAAABY/K7517PaQzaE/w1044-h536-no/Dominion%2Btower.png[/img] [img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-xtnPpWnp9tE/VNkFkhnmzFI/AAAAAAAAABk/vlWZk2Vy61s/w1044-h536-no/Fishing.png[/img] [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-UMNNqLIA08o/VNkGE0J2kfI/AAAAAAAAAB0/NiN5eykFtj4/w1044-h538-no/Home.png[/img] [img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-Oi0-myK1gx8/VNkGFTUty4I/AAAAAAAAABw/m1dkODlFg5I/w1044-h538-no/Kalphite%2Bqueen.png[/img] [img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-IgWnJzCC9aQ/VNkHmd7TniI/AAAAAAAAACA/3nXABPYA9Fg/w1044-h538-no/Nex.png[/img] [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-XziytsZvKww/VNkH_XL2beI/AAAAAAAAACI/H0K-gxOcTQU/w1044-h538-no/Revenants.png[/img] [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-5yjS2Pdb-qk/VNkIqjm-FzI/AAAAAAAAACQ/-NI1KXHj_r4/w1044-h539-no/Runespan.png[/img] [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-wFS0k_ihG4s/VNkJLj1lnmI/AAAAAAAAACY/2KgrnVgg-p0/w1044-h538-no/Slayer%2Btower.png[/img] [img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-kogEupe2QBk/VNkJWI-FpXI/AAAAAAAAACg/uS7J4ftH15o/w1044-h535-no/Tormented%2Bdemons.png[/img]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Join us now - You will not regret![/SIZE][/CENTER]
